summary: Three people who despise each other find themselves sharing a room in Hell - forever.
cast: Arletty|Frank Villard|Gaby Sylvia|Yves Deniaud|Nicole Courcel|Jean Debucourt|Suzanne Dehelly|Paul Frankeur|Renaud Mary|Jean Murat|Isabelle Pia|Arlette Thomas|Morena Casamance|Michèle Cordoue|Giani Esposito|René Havard|René Hiéronimus|Josselin|Jean-Pierre Lituac|Max Mégy|Claude Nicot|Pierre Vaneck|Catherine Valnay|Daniel Cauchy|Jacques Chabassol|Jean Daurand|Danièle Delorme|Jacques Duby|Gilles Gallon|Bob Ingarao|Janine Leperre|Mag-Avril|Bernard Musson|Suzanne Nivette|Maurice Sarfati|Julien Verdier
title: Huis-clos
